div.head: TO THE RIGHT Worshipfull, Richard Reynell, Esquire, and Thomas Reynell, and Walter Reynell, his brethren, Grace, happinesse, and Peace, &c.
div.p:
THe world may well woonder what winde hath driuen these Papers of mine to the Presse, or what should presse me to send these vnpollished meditations

greatest part of my worldly wel-being. I am • ot • to r • bbe vp and open 〈◊〉
